LanguageData.CK_EggJunglefowlFertilized.label: junglefowl egg (fert.)
LanguageData.CK_EggJunglefowlFertilized.description: Fertilized junglefowl egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby junglefowl. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.CK_EggJunglefowlUnfertilized.label: junglehen egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.CK_EggJunglefowlUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized junglefowl egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.
LanguageData.CK_EggKomodoFertilized.label: Komodo dragon egg (fert.)
LanguageData.CK_EggKomodoFertilized.description: Fertilized Komodo dragon egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby Komodo dragon. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.CK_EggKomodoUnFertilized.label: Komodo dragon egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.CK_EggKomodoUnFertilized.description: Unfertilized Komodo dragon egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.CK_EggPeafowlFertilized.label: peafowl egg (fert.)
LanguageData.CK_EggPeafowlFertilized.description: Fertilized peafowl egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby peafowl. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
LanguageData.CK_EggPeafowlUnfertilized.label: peafowl egg (unfert.)
LanguageData.CK_EggPeafowlUnfertilized.description: Unfertilized peafowl egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much, much better cooked.

LanguageData.CK_EggPythonFertilized.description: Fertilized python egg. If all goes well, it should hatch into a baby python. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.

LanguageData.CK_EggPythonUnFertilized.description: Unfertilized python egg. It can be eaten raw, but it's much better cooked.
